citations.narrative:
There were accumulations of feces and soiled bedding in approximately 24 of 79 guinea pig enclosures especially in the
upper weanling enclosures and in the adult enclosures housing many offspring. Enclosures were last cleaned on May 6,
2023. Accumulations of feces and soiled bedding exposes the guinea pigs to disease hazards and health problems.
Primary enclosures must be cleaned often enough to prevent accumulations of feces, soiled bedding, and food debris. In
addition, enclosures must be sanitized at least once every 2 weeks. Correct by May 11, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.31(a)(1) 
   
Sanitation. 
There were accumulations of feces and soiled bedding in approximately 24 of 79 guinea pig enclosures especially in the 
upper weanling enclosures and in the adult enclosures housing  many offspring. Enclosures were last cleaned on May 6, 
2023. Accumulations of feces and soiled bedding  exposes the guinea pigs to disease hazards and health problems. 
Primary enclosures must be cleaned often enough to prevent accumulations of feces, soiled bedding, and food debris. In 
addition, enclosures must be sanitized at least once every 2 weeks. Correct by May 11, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
